data.name: The Revival
data.detailed_description:
Key Features:



Single Player Campaign and Cinematics
Engaging campaign and storyline where you will play as an elite mercenary
taking you to different dangerous places and conflicts around the world.
With the special weapons and equipment which is provided to you, your actions will determine the fate of millions of people.

STORYLINE
In the near future, a mysterious virus of unknown origin has taken over a large portion of the world’s population. It kills the infected within a day. There is a temporary injection treatment which is resets every 1 day. The permanent cure is stolen from the biggest biotech lab in the city that can eradicate the virus.

Your mission is bring the cure back to the biotech lab and fight against top-secret military groups.
That risky and dangerous mission turns into a death sentence when the militants coming dozens of vehicles filled with hundreds of trained killers
armed to the teeth with assault rifles, submachine guns, grenades, and rocket launchers.
Your team will provide you with any updates and tactical support during the operations and battle if you need it.

Alternate Story and Zombie Mode
What if the virus takes over the whole world, what if you fail your mission ?
Alternate story will take you to the after the apocalypse.
The permanent cure was never found.
%90 of the world's population has turned into monsters because of the virus.
Different story, challenging missions and different weapons...

//Developer's note
We are planning to do alternate story and missions after the full game release.
***Not certain but likely

data.short_description: The Revival is a story-based,basic action First-Person Shooter game which is set in the near future and in an infected world. Play through the battle as a well-trained mercenary fighting on his own against his deadly competitors.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K@3.5GHz or Ryzen 5 1500X@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
